document_data.name: Hylos Nimarel
document_data.mainbody: los had light skin, blue-green eyes, and short white hair.
document_data.Description: Hylos had light skin, blue-green eyes, and short white hair.
document_data.History: Around the time of the [[Sschindylryn invasion of Eveningstar]] in the mid-1480s [[DR]],{{DDO-time}} Hylos visited Eveningstar with his [[cart]] and [[ox]]en. He took note of the interest in the [[Storm Horns]] mountains by [[adventurer]]s and [[Purple Dragons]] at the time.
